name: Acid Burst
description: Conjures a burst of corrosive acid that splashes against the target.
notes: Circle 6 conjuration. High-damage single-target acid spell.

name: Ancestral Vengeance
description: Calls upon ancestral spirits to strike your foe with righteous fury.
notes: Circle 7 necromancy/evocation. Mix of radiant and necrotic from ancestral spirits.

name: Apocalyptic Anthem
description: A powerful monk chant that rings with demise and fatality, forcing enemies in the room to attack the chanter. Those who fail their saving throw will stop fighting their current target and turn their aggression toward you.
notes: Area-effect taunt ability. Awakened, non-grouped enemies who fail paralysis save are forced to attack the chanter.

name: Aria Of Dissonance
description: A discordant monk chant that disrupts enemy coordination, reducing their accuracy in combat. This offensive chant penalizes the target's ability to land attacks.
notes: Single-target debuff that reduces enemy accuracy.

name: Armor
description: The Armor spell will improve your AC by 2.
notes: The Armor spell will improve your AC by 2.

name: Baleful Polymorph
description: Attempts to transform the target into a harmless creature, dealing damage if the transformation fails.
notes: Circle 7 transmutation. Pure force damage from failed transformation energy.

name: Ballad Of Tears
description: A mournful bardic song that weakens enemy strikes, reducing their damage output. This melancholy melody saps the fighting spirit of foes.
notes: Damage reduction debuff for enemy targets.

name: Bash
description: Shield bash attack that deals physical damage and may knock the opponent down, interrupting their actions
notes: Offensive combat skill requiring a shield. Deals damage based on skill level and strength, with a chance to knock down and interrupt the target

name: Battle Hymn
description: An empowering monk chant that sharpens combat focus and improves accuracy. This self-buff enhances the monk's ability to strike true in battle.

name: Bigbys Clenched Fist
description: Summons a giant magical fist that pummels your enemy with devastating force.
notes: Circle 8 evocation. Pure force damage from magical construct.

name: Bless
description: Bless on a victim will improve the victims saving throw versus spells by 1, and furthermore improve the hitroll by 2. Bless on an item currently has no defined action.  It is only possible
notes: Bless on a victim will improve the victims saving throw versus spells by 1, and furthermore improve the hitroll by 2. Bless on an item currently has no defined action.  It is only possible

name: Blindness
description: Blindness will blind a victim failing its saving throw. A blinded person will have -4 penalty to both hitroll and AC.
notes: Blindness will blind a victim failing its saving throw. A blinded person will have -4 penalty to both hitroll and AC.

name: Blizzards Of Saint Augustine
description: A powerful monk chant invoking the icy fury of Saint Augustine, significantly increasing damage output. This buff channels frozen wrath to empower the monk's strikes.
notes: Saint Augustine chant series - moderate damage bonus (+3 damroll).

name: Burning Hands
description: Flames shoot from your fingertips, scorching everything in a cone before you.
notes: Circle 1 evocation. Basic fire damage spell, touch range.

name: Call Lightning
description: This spell will use the "force of nature" to make a lightning strike the victim.  It is therefore only possible to call lightning outside, and it has to be raining (or worse).
notes: This spell will use the "force of nature" to make a lightning strike the victim.  It is therefore only possible to call lightning outside, and it has to be raining (or worse).

name: Chill Touch
description: This spell is more powerful than the magic missile spell. A victim failing its saving throw will get its strength reduced by one.
notes: This spell is more powerful than the magic missile spell. A victim failing its saving throw will get its strength reduced by one.

name: Cone Of Cold
description: A blast of freezing air erupts from your hands, flash-freezing everything before you.
notes: Circle 5 evocation. Primary cold damage with force component from pressurized air.

name: Control Weather
description: This spell will change the "course" of the current weather. Example: > cast 'control wea' worse
notes: This spell will change the "course" of the current weather. Example: > cast 'control wea' worse

name: Create Food
description: This spell instantly creates a fresh waybread.  The waybread will be filling for the next (5+level) hours, up to a maximum of 24 hours.
notes: This spell instantly creates a fresh waybread.  The waybread will be filling for the next (5+level) hours, up to a maximum of 24 hours.

name: Create Water
description: Expect disastrous results if cast upon a drink container which contains another liquid than water.  Empty or water containers will be filled depending on the level of the caster.
notes: Expect disastrous results if cast upon a drink container which contains another liquid than water.  Empty or water containers will be filled depending on the level of the caster.

params.objectType: Water in container or creates spring

name: Crown Of Madness
description: A chaotic bardic performance that drives the target mad, causing confusion. The victim cannot distinguish friend from foe and may attack randomly. The effect breaks when the victim takes damage.
notes: Confusion effect broken by damage. Causes random targeting.

name: Cure Blind
description: This spell will cure a person blinded by the "blindness" spell, it can not remove blindness caused by for example cursed items.
notes: This spell will cure a person blinded by the "blindness" spell, it can not remove blindness caused by for example cursed items.

name: Cure Critic
description: This spell cures 3d8+3 hitpoints of damage.
notes: This spell cures 3d8+3 hitpoints of damage.

name: Curse
description: Curse cast on a person that fails the saving throw, will reduce their hitroll and damage roll both by one.  It will also reduce the saving throw versus paralysation by one.
notes: Curse cast on a person that fails the saving throw, will reduce their hitroll and damage roll both by one.  It will also reduce the saving throw versus paralysation by one.

name: Decay
description: Causes the target's flesh to rot and wither with necrotic energy.
notes: Circle 4 necromancy. Necrotic damage causing cellular breakdown.

name: Detect Magic
description: This spell will let you see the magical aura surrounding magical objects.
notes: This spell will let you see the magical aura surrounding magical objects.

name: Detect Poison
description: Cast on food or drinks (drink containers) you will be able to sense if it is poisoned. Cast on a person you will be able to see if that person is
notes: Cast on food or drinks (drink containers) you will be able to sense if it is poisoned. Cast on a person you will be able to see if that person is

name: Detonation
description: Creates a violent magical explosion centered on the target.
notes: Circle 6 evocation. Explosive force with secondary fire damage.

name: Discorporate
description: Unravels the target's physical form, devastating illusory creatures.
notes: Circle 6 abjuration. Instant kill vs illusions, reduced damage vs real targets.

name: Disease
notes: Circle 3 necromancy. Debuff that reduces CON and STR by 10-20 based on skill. Duration 5-15 ticks. Curable by Heal/Full Heal.

name: Disintegrate
description: A thin green ray springs from your finger, reducing the target to fine dust.
notes: Circle 9 transmutation. Highest single-target damage spell. Destroys target on kill.

name: Dispel Evil
description: This spell will only affect evil creatures.  An evil person of level equal or less than caster will suffer 100 damage points. If the victim is higher level than caster, the spell will inflict
notes: This spell will only affect evil creatures.  An evil person of level equal or less than caster will suffer 100 damage points. If the victim is higher level than caster, the spell will inflict

name: Dispel Good
description: This spell will only affect good creatures.  A good person of level equal or less than caster will suffer 100 damage points. If the victim is higher level than caster, the spell will inflict
notes: This spell will only affect good creatures.  A good person of level equal or less than caster will suffer 100 damage points. If the victim is higher level than caster, the spell will inflict

name: Dispel Magic
description: Attempts to end magical effects on a target creature or object.
notes: Circle 3 abjuration. Removes magical effects based on contested check.

name: Earth Blessing
description: Channels the enduring strength of the earth into the target, bolstering their constitution and physical resilience.
notes: Circle 2 transmutation. Grants +2 CON for extended duration. Earth sphere druidic magic.

name: Earthquake
description: Causes the ground to violently shake and rupture, damaging and potentially knocking down all creatures in the area.
notes: Circle 5 evocation. Area damage spell. Only works outdoors on solid ground. Damage modified by terrain type. Feather Fall reduces damage by half and prevents knockdown. Flying targets immune. Earth sphere druidic magic.

name: Electrify
description: Channels electrical energy through your weapon, adding shocking damage to your attacks.
notes: Combat skill. Adds shock damage based on skill proficiency to weapon attacks.

name: Elemental Warding
description: Surrounds the target with a protective barrier that absorbs fire damage.
notes: Circle 4 abjuration. Grants 50% fire resistance for extended duration. Druidic elemental protection magic.

name: Enchant Weapon
description: This spell will enchant non-magical (non-modifying) weapons only. By non-modifying weapons we refer to weapons that might alter any ability such as for example damage.  The only way to know if a weapon
notes: This spell will enchant non-magical (non-modifying) weapons only. By non-modifying weapons we refer to weapons that might alter any ability such as for example damage.  The only way to know if a weapon

name: Energy Drain
description: This spell does not give much damage, but victims failing their saving throws will loose up to 40,000 XP points.  You will gain a quarter of this XP.
notes: This spell does not give much damage, but victims failing their saving throws will loose up to 40,000 XP points.  You will gain a quarter of this XP.

name: Enrapture
description: An enchanting bardic performance that removes all negative effects from the target. This uplifting melody dispels debuffs and restores the target to their natural state.
notes: Removes all debuffs from target. Bardic cleanse ability.

name: Fireball
description: Hurls a ball of fire that explodes on impact, dealing massive fire damage with concussive force.
notes: Circle 5 evocation. Primary fire damage with force component from explosion.

name: Fires Of Saint Augustine
description: A powerful monk chant invoking the burning passion of Saint Augustine, significantly increasing damage output. This buff channels holy flames to empower the monk's strikes.
notes: Saint Augustine chant series - moderate damage bonus (+3 damroll).

name: Fracture
description: Shatters the target's bones with crushing magical force.
notes: Circle 5 necromancy. Bone-crushing damage. Double damage vs charmed targets.

name: Fracture Shrapnel
description: Bone fragments from a Fracture spell explode outward, striking nearby enemies.
notes: Secondary effect from Fracture. Area damage from bone shrapnel.

name: Freedom Song
description: An uplifting bardic song that enhances the target's evasion, making them harder to hit. This liberating melody grants freedom of movement and agility in combat.
notes: Evasion buff increases chance to avoid attacks.

name: Freeze
description: Encases the target in a shell of ice, dealing severe cold damage.
notes: Circle 6 evocation. High single-target cold damage.

name: Gas Breath
notes: Poison breath attack. Deals poison damage and may poison target. Uses breath formula: skill + random(1, skill*2).

name: Harm
description: This spell removes all but 1d4 hitpoints from the victim.  The maximum number of damage points are 100.  It is not possible to kill using this spell (but almost).
notes: This spell removes all but 1d4 hitpoints from the victim.  The maximum number of damage points are 100.  It is not possible to kill using this spell (but almost).

name: Empower
description: Channels magical energy to empower your next spell. The empowered spell deals additional damage based on the target's level.
notes: Next spell deals +1% damage per victim level. Consumed on first spell cast.

name: Heal
description: Heal will heal all the hitpoints from a person, except 1d4 points. Maximum 100 points can be healed.  A victim who is blinded will also be cured by the heal spell.
notes: Heal will heal all the hitpoints from a person, except 1d4 points. Maximum 100 points can be healed.  A victim who is blinded will also be cured by the heal spell.

name: Hearthsong
description: A warm and comforting bardic song that enhances mental focus, improving spell casting and mental clarity. This soothing melody recalls the safety and comfort of hearth and home.
notes: Focus buff improves spell casting and mental stats.

name: Heroic Journey
description: An inspiring bardic song that enhances combat accuracy, recalling tales of legendary heroes. This epic melody fills allies with courage and precision.

name: Hymn Of Saint Augustine
description: A harmonious monk chant invoking Saint Augustine's strength, increasing damage output. This basic buff from the Saint Augustine series empowers the monk's attacks.
notes: Saint Augustine chant series - basic damage bonus (+2 damroll).

name: Iceball
description: Hurls a ball of compressed ice that explodes on impact with freezing force.
notes: Circle 5 evocation. Cold equivalent of Fireball with concussive component.

name: Identify
description: This divination spell reveals the magical properties, stats, and effects of a targeted item.
notes: Targets a held or inventory object. Reveals item type, stats, effects, flags, value, and magical properties.

name: Immolate
description: Sets the target ablaze with magical fire that continues to burn.
notes: Circle 4 evocation. Lower initial damage but applies burning DoT effect.

name: Infravision
description: Allows the caster to detect the heat given off by objects giving them the ability to have much better vision in dark conditions.
notes: Allows the caster to detect the heat given off by objects giving them the ability to have much better vision in dark conditions.

name: Inspiration
description: A motivating bardic song that inspires allies to fight with greater accuracy. This empowering melody fills hearts with determination and improves combat precision.

name: Interminable Wrath
description: A monk chant channeling endless fury, significantly increasing damage output. This buff empowers the monk's strikes with relentless anger.

name: Iron Maiden
description: Conjures phantom iron spikes that pierce the target from all directions.
notes: Circle 6 conjuration. Pure physical piercing damage.

name: Ivory Symphony
description: A strangely alarming melody that causes enemies to flee in terror. This area-effect chant creates panic in the room, forcing victims to flee if they fail their saving throw. More effective in dark rooms and against non-sentinel mobs.
notes: Causes mass fleeing in enemies. Dark rooms bypass saving throw for non-sentinels. Sentinel mobs get additional save.

name: Joyful Noise
description: A jubilant bardic song that enhances the target's charisma and force of personality. This uplifting melody makes the target more persuasive and socially influential.
notes: Charisma buff improves social interactions and certain skills.

name: Kick
description: Martial arts kick that deals physical damage and can interrupt spellcasting
notes: Offensive combat skill usable by fighters and monks. Deals physical damage based on skill and dexterity, with a chance to interrupt enemy actions

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A stroke of lightning forms between you and the target, accompanied by a deafening thunderclap.
notes: Circle 3 evocation. Primary shock damage with sonic component from thunder.

name: Locate Object
description: If possible you will know exactly where an object is, or the name of the person using it.  If more than one object by the same name exists, you will get a listing of several objects.
notes: If possible you will know exactly where an object is, or the name of the person using it.  If more than one object by the same name exists, you will get a listing of several objects.

name: Magic Missile
description: Causes a bolt of magical energy to be thrown from the casters hands at the victim.
notes: Causes a bolt of magical energy to be thrown from the casters hands at the victim.

name: Meditate
description: Enter a meditative state to improve focus. Active while meditating.

name: Melt
description: Intense heat causes the target to partially liquify, dealing devastating fire damage.
notes: Circle 8 evocation. Very high fire damage, longer cast time.

name: Moonwell
notes: Circle 10 summoning. Creates a bidirectional moonwell portal to target player. Duration: 2 ticks. Requires target to be a player, not in NOWELL room.

name: Nightmare
description: Assaults the target's mind with terrifying visions that cause psychic damage.
notes: Circle 4 illusion/enchantment. Pure mental damage from psychic assault.

name: Nourishment
notes: Circle 5 healing. Restores hunger and thirst to full (24) in natural terrain. Partial effect in water (thirst only). No effect in air/city.

name: Peace
description: A serene chant that washes peace into the room, immediately stopping all combat. All fighting ceases and NPC memories are cleared, providing a moment of tranquility and safety.
notes: Stops all combat in the room and clears NPC aggro. Special implementation: calls stop_fighting on all combatants and clear_memory on NPCs. No standard effect applies.

name: Phosphoric Embers
description: Scatters glowing embers that cling to the target and continue to burn.
notes: Circle 3 evocation. Lower damage, applies lingering burn effect.

name: Poison
description: Casting poison on food or drink (containers) will poison it.  Eating poisoned food/drinks will poison the person eating or drinking. A person who is poisoned will suffer damage every hour, lose strength, and
notes: Casting poison on food or drink (containers) will poison it.  Eating poisoned food/drinks will poison the person eating or drinking. A person who is poisoned will suffer damage every hour, lose strength, and

name: Positive Field
description: Channels positive energy into a damaging field that sears undead and heals the living.
notes: Circle 6 evocation. Radiant damage, extra effective vs undead.

name: Pyre
description: Engulfs the target in a pillar of flame, creating a funeral pyre.
notes: Circle 4 evocation. Fire damage with bonus vs charmed targets.

name: Pyre Recoil
description: The flames of a Pyre spell lash back at nearby enemies.
notes: Secondary effect from Pyre. Area fire damage to nearby enemies.

name: Rain
description: Summons a torrential rainstorm in the current area, reducing visibility and creating wet conditions.
notes: Circle 5 conjuration. Creates weather effect in the room.

name: Ray of Enfeeblement
description: A ray of negative energy saps the target's strength, significantly weakening them.
notes: Circle 2 necromancy. Debuff spell that reduces STR by -15 - (skill/10) for 8 + (skill/20) rounds.

name: Rebuke Undead
description: Channels negative energy to bolster undead creatures, enhancing their combat capabilities.
notes: Circle 3 necromancy. Evil cleric spell that buffs undead allies. Reduces evasion significantly.

name: Recall
description: Instantly transports the caster back to their recall point (usually their hometown temple).
notes: Circle 6 conjuration. Basic teleportation spell to safety.

name: Reduce
description: Magically shrinks the target, reducing their size and strength.
notes: Circle 3 transmutation. Reduces size and strength (-10 STR). Hostile size manipulation.

name: Regeneration
description: A restorative monk chant that gradually heals the caster over time. Each tick restores a percentage of maximum health, providing sustained healing in and out of combat.
notes: Increases HP regeneration rate. Duration scales with level.

name: Relocate
description: Teleports the caster to a previously visited location or target.
notes: Circle 7 conjuration. Advanced teleportation spell to known locations.

name: Remove Curse
description: Will remove a curse on carried objects or any persons in the room.
notes: Will remove a curse on carried objects or any persons in the room.

name: Remove Poison
description: Will remove the affects of poison from a victim or an object.
notes: Will remove the affects of poison from a victim or an object.

name: Reveal Hidden
description: Grants the ability to detect hidden and invisible creatures.
notes: Circle 2 divination. Applies detect_hidden status for level rounds.

name: Sanctuary
description: When protected by sanctuary you will only receive 1/2 the normal damage caused by a particular blow.
notes: Circle 6 abjuration. Powerful protection spell reducing all damage by 50%.

name: Sane Mind
description: Restores mental clarity and removes confusion effects from the target.
notes: Circle 3 abjuration. Removes mental status effects and confusion.

name: Seed Of Destruction
description: A malevolent monk chant that plants a seed of destruction in the target, dealing unholy damage over time. This damage-over-time effect corrupts the victim from within.
notes: DoT ability dealing 5% of target's max HP per tick for 10 ticks. High-level monk offensive chant.

name: Sense Life
description: Allows the caster to sense the presence of a player or monster in the room which is hiding.  The true identity will remain hidden however. Invisible persons are also considered hidden.
notes: Allows the caster to sense the presence of a player or monster in the room which is hiding.  The true identity will remain hidden however. Invisible persons are also considered hidden.

name: Severance
description: Delivers a magically enhanced cutting attack that severs flesh and bone.
notes: Circle 5 transmutation/evocation. Physical damage spell with complex formula: dam + (pow(skill, 2) * 13) / 200.

name: Shadows Sorrow Song
description: A melancholic monk chant that saps enemy combat ability, significantly reducing their accuracy. This debuff shrouds enemies in sorrow, making their attacks less effective.
notes: Stronger debuff than Aria of Dissonance (-3 hitroll vs -2).

name: Shift Corpse
description: Teleports a targeted corpse to the caster's location.
notes: Circle 4 necromancy/conjuration. Retrieves corpses from afar for animation or looting.

name: Shocking Grasp
description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a powerful shock to the target.
notes: Circle 1 evocation. Basic touch-range shock damage.

name: Silence
description: Prevents the target from speaking or casting spells with verbal components.
notes: Circle 3 enchantment. Crowd control spell that silences the target, preventing spellcasting.

name: Simulacrum
description: Creates a semi-real duplicate of a creature made from ice and snow.
notes: Circle 7 illusion. High-level summoning spell creating a powerful duplicate.

name: Sleep
description: Puts the target into a magical slumber, breaking on damage.
notes: Circle 1 enchantment. Basic crowd control spell. Breaks on damage.

name: Smoke
description: Creates a cloud of obscuring smoke that reduces accuracy and evasion in the area.
notes: Circle 2 conjuration. Battlefield control spell with accuracy and evasion penalties.

name: Sonata Of Malaise
description: A draining monk chant that weakens the target's constitution, reducing their health and resilience. This debuff saps the victim's vitality and endurance.
notes: Constitution debuff reduces max HP and stamina.

name: Song Of Rest
description: A peaceful bardic song that enhances mental focus and clarity, promoting rest and recuperation. This calming melody improves concentration and spell casting ability.
notes: Focus buff improves mental clarity and spell casting. Same effect as Hearthsong.

name: Soul Reaver
description: Warps reality into a deadly vision of calamity that tears at the souls of all present, dealing devastating mental and shadow damage.
notes: Circle 12 illusion/necromancy. Area damage spell with necrotic and shadow damage. Very high circle spell for illusionists.

name: Soul Tap
description: Channels dark energy to grant lifesteal, healing the caster for a portion of damage dealt.
notes: Circle 5 necromancy. Grants 25% lifesteal for level rounds.

name: Soulshield
description: Creates a magical barrier that resists harmful magic.
notes: Circle 4 abjuration. Grants 25% magic resistance for level*2 rounds.

name: Speak In Tongues
description: Grants the ability to understand and speak all languages.
notes: Circle 3 divination. Universal translation and comprehension for level*2 rounds.

effects.notes: FIXME: Should grant language comprehension, but using detect_hidden as placeholder

name: Spinechiller
description: A terrifying presence that unnerves enemies, reducing their evasion.
notes: Circle 2 necromancy. Fear-based debuff reducing enemy evasion by -5 for skill/4 rounds.

name: Spirit Arrows
description: Conjures multiple ethereal arrows that strike the target repeatedly.
notes: Circle 4 conjuration. Multi-hit spell dealing force damage.

name: Spirit Ray
description: Fires a beam of pure spiritual energy that pierces the target's soul.
notes: Circle 8 evocation/necromancy. High radiant damage, longer cast time.

name: Spirit of the Bear
description: A monk chant channeling the spirit of the bear, greatly increasing constitution. This buff enhances the monk's endurance, health, and resilience like a mighty bear.
notes: Spirit animal buff providing +4 CON. Longer duration than typical chants (level * 2).

name: Spirit of the Wolf
description: A monk chant channeling the spirit of the wolf, greatly increasing dexterity. This buff enhances the monk's agility, speed, and reflexes like a swift wolf.
notes: Spirit animal buff providing +4 DEX. Longer duration than typical chants (level * 2).

name: Statue
description: Petrifies the target, turning them to stone and paralyzing them completely.
notes: Circle 6 transmutation. Complete paralysis without breaking on damage.

name: Stone Skin
description: Hardens the target's skin to be tough as stone, granting physical damage resistance.
notes: Circle 4 abjuration. Grants 25% physical resistance for level rounds.

name: Stygian Eruption
description: Channels the dark power of the river Styx in a violent eruption of unholy fire and shadow.
notes: Circle 6 evocation/necromancy. Unholy damage spell requiring evil alignment (<-400). Formula: dam + (pow(skill, 2) * 1) / 125, scaled by alignment.

name: Summon
description: Will summon a person of the name spoken.  It is not possible to summon someone of three or more levels above yourself. If you attempt to summon a monster, it will get a saving throw.
notes: Circle 6 conjuration. Forcibly teleports a player or creature to the caster. Level restrictions apply.

name: Summon Corpse
description: Summons a corpse from elsewhere to the caster's location.
notes: Circle 3 necromancy/conjuration. Retrieves corpses for animation or recovery.

name: Summon Demon
description: Summons a demon from the lower planes to serve the caster.
notes: Circle 7 conjuration. Powerful summoning spell creating a demonic ally.

name: Summon Dracolich
description: Summons a dracolich, an undead dragon of immense power.
notes: Circle 9 necromancy/conjuration. Highest-tier summon creating an undead dragon ally.

name: Summon Elemental
description: Summons an elemental being from the elemental planes.
notes: Circle 5 conjuration. Summons fire, water, earth, or air elemental based on context.

name: Summon Greater Demon
description: Summons a greater demon, a powerful fiend from the lower planes.
notes: Circle 9 conjuration. High-tier summoning spell creating a very powerful demonic ally.

name: Sunray
description: Channels intense sunlight to blind and disorient enemies in the area.
notes: Circle 5 evocation. Debuff spell reducing accuracy and evasion with radiant energy.

name: Supernova
description: Unleashes a cataclysmic explosion of stellar fire and radiant energy, devastating all in the area.
notes: Circle 12 evocation. Highest-tier area damage spell for pyromancers. Massive fire and radiant damage.

name: Teleport
description: Teleports the caster to a random location within the zone.

name: Tempest Of Saint Augustine
description: A mighty monk chant invoking the tempest fury of Saint Augustine, greatly increasing damage output. This powerful buff channels storm-like rage to maximize the monk's striking power.
notes: Saint Augustine chant series - strongest damage bonus (+4 damroll).

name: Terror
description: A haunting bardic performance that instills overwhelming fear in enemies.
notes: Bardic song. Fear effect breaking on damage for level/4 rounds.

name: Tremors Of Saint Augustine
description: A powerful monk chant invoking the earthshaking tremors of Saint Augustine, significantly increasing damage output. This buff channels ground-quaking force to empower the monk's blows.
notes: Saint Augustine chant series - moderate damage bonus (+3 damroll).

name: Unholy Word
description: Utters a word of dark divine power that blasts good-aligned enemies with unholy energy.
notes: Circle 6 evocation. Area spell affecting only good-aligned creatures. Evil caster casting this on good enemies. Kills caster if good-aligned!

name: Urban Renewal
description: Unleashes destructive magical energy across the entire area.
notes: Circle 8 evocation. Area damage spell with magical force. No specific damage formula in legacy code.

name: Vampiric Breath
description: Exhales vampiric energy that drains life force from the target, healing the caster.
notes: Circle 4 necromancy. Life-draining attack that deals necrotic damage and heals caster for damage dealt. Formula: dam + roll_dice(2, skill + 10), +random(0,70) if skill>=95.

name: Vaporform
description: Transforms the caster into mist, granting invisibility and ethereal movement.
notes: Circle 5 transmutation. Grants invisibility for level rounds through gaseous transformation.

name: Ventriloquate
description: Creates an illusion that makes an object or person appear to speak.
notes: Circle 1 illusion. Utility spell for deception and misdirection.

name: Vicious Mockery
description: Your insults are laced with subtle enchantments that cause psychic pain.
notes: Circle 0 (cantrip) enchantment. Bard spell dealing mental damage.

name: Vigorize Critic
description: Restores movement energy to the target, refreshing their stamina.

name: Vigorize Light
description: Restores movement energy to the target, refreshing their stamina.

name: Vigorize Serious
description: Restores movement energy to the target, refreshing their stamina.

name: Vitality
description: Enhances the target's life force, temporarily increasing maximum hit points.
notes: Circle 5 transmutation. Grants skill/2 bonus max HP for level*2 rounds.

name: Wandering Woods
description: Causes the forest itself to shift, teleporting the caster randomly through the woods.
notes: Circle 4 conjuration/transmutation. Random teleportation spell themed for druids.

name: War Cry
description: A fearsome battle cry that damages enemies and bolsters the monk's combat prowess. This powerful chant adds extra damage to each of the monk's attacks.
notes: Adds skill-based physical damage to each melee hit. Very high-level monk ability (level 90).

name: Water Blast
description: Conjures a high-pressure jet of water that slams into the target with tremendous force.
notes: Circle 5 conjuration. Primary water damage with physical impact from pressure.

name: Waterform
description: Transforms the caster into a water-like form, allowing them to breathe underwater.
notes: Circle 3 transmutation. Grants waterbreathing for level rounds.

name: Waterwalk
description: Allows the target to walk on water as if it were solid ground.
notes: Circle 3 transmutation. Grants water-walking ability for level*3 rounds.

name: Web
description: Creates sticky magical webs that entangle and immobilize the target.
notes: Circle 2 conjuration. Crowd control spell that webs target for level/2 rounds. Does not break on damage.

name: Wings Of Heaven
description: Manifests angelic wings that grant the power of flight.
notes: Circle 4 transmutation. Grants flight for level*2 rounds.

name: Wings Of Hell
description: Manifests demonic wings that grant the power of flight.
notes: Circle 4 transmutation. Grants flight for level*2 rounds.

name: Wizard Eye
description: Creates an invisible magical sensor that reveals hidden things within the zone.
notes: Circle 4 divination. One-time reveal of hidden creatures/objects within the zone.

name: Word Of Command
description: Speaks a word of power that compels the target to obey the caster.
notes: Circle 5 enchantment. Charm spell forcing obedience for level/4 rounds.

name: Word Of Recall
description: The caster will be transferred back to his hometown sanctuary (usually the Temple of Midgaard).
notes: Circle 6 conjuration. Instantly returns caster to their hometown sanctuary.

name: World Teleport
description: Teleports the caster to a random location anywhere in the world.
notes: Circle 9 conjuration. Long-range random teleportation across the entire world.

name: Writhing Weeds
description: Animates plants and weeds to attack and entangle the target with crushing force.
notes: Circle 3 transmutation/conjuration. Nature damage spell requiring outdoors. Formula: dam + (pow(skill, 2) * 53) / 10000.
